20110116070257.000|20110116070259.000|CC1|GETTING HELP FOR MENTALLY       
20110116070259.000|20110116070301.000|CC1|DISTURBED STUDENTS IN TIME TO   
20110116070301.000|20110116070302.000|CC1|PREVENT VIOLENCE.               
20110116070302.000|20110116070304.000|CC1|IT SETS UP A SYSTEM TO INTERVENE
20110116070304.000|20110116070306.000|CC1|WHEN A STUDENT DISPLAYS         
20110116070306.000|20110116070307.000|CC1|TROUBLING BEHAVIOR.             
20110116070307.000|20110116070309.000|CC1|THE PROGRAM IS A RESPONSE TO    
20110116070309.000|20110116070312.000|CC1|LAST WEEK'S SHOOTING RAMPAGE IN 
20110116070312.000|20110116070313.000|CC1|TUCSON, ARIZONA.                
20110116070313.000|20110116070315.000|CC1|THE GUNMAN JARED LEE LOUGHNER   
20110116070315.000|20110116070316.000|CC1|HAD BEEN EXPELLED FROM PIMA     
20110116070316.000|20110116070317.000|CC1|COMMUNITY COLLEGE.              
20110116070317.000|20110116070318.000|CC1|EVEN THOUGH COLLEGE OFFICIAL SLS
20110116070318.000|20110116070321.000|CC1|THOUGHT HE WAS MENTALLY ILL,

20110116070323.000|20110116070324.000|CC1|HEALTH AUTHORITIES.             
20110116070324.000|20110116070325.000|CC1|IT WILL GIVE STUDENTS EASY

20110116070327.000|20110116070330.000|CC1|TEAM, PROVIDES A 24-HOUR

20110116070332.000|20110116070334.000|CC1|LINE WHERE STUDENTS AND FACULTY

20110116070339.000|20110116070344.000|CC1|TENDENCY AND SUICIDAL TENDENCIES

20110116072634.000|20110116072635.000|CC1|INGREDIENT IS THE FORM OF A     
20110116072635.000|20110116072635.000|CC1|PROTEIN.

20110116072637.000|20110116072640.000|CC1|CUPS OF COFFEE EVERY DAY WERE
